ResearchProjectDef.label: earth writing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colony to chisel out stony shelves and create tablets at crafting spots that retain stories of your colony. Parting the red sea is not included.

ResearchProjectDef.label: leather scribing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colony to scribe texts on leather scrolls at crafting spots that retain stories of your colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bookshelves
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colony to construct shelves for scrolls, journals, and books.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pages and bookbinding
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colony to create pages at paper tables and write handwritten pages and simple books at a writer's table or crafting spot.

ResearchProjectDef.label: typewriting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct a writing table with a mechanical typewriter to provide a joyful creative outlet for your colonists.
